title: WordPress Security Best Practices
description: Learn essential security measures to protect your WordPress website from common threats and vulnerabilities.

blocks.content: Website security is crucial for protecting your content, user data, and reputation. This guide covers essential security measures every WordPress site should implement.

Protect your login page with these measures:

  • Use strong passwords with special characters
  • Implement two-factor authentication
  • Limit login attempts
  • Change the default admin username
  • Use SSL encryption

Keep your site secure with regular maintenance:

  • Update WordPress core regularly
  • Keep themes and plugins updated
  • Remove unused themes and plugins
  • Regular backup schedule
  • Security plugin configuration
